Using her [[Puppet Performance: Skilful Achievement with a Human Body]], Chiyo launches Sakura high into the air to deliver a [[Chakra Enhanced Strength|chakra-enhanced punch]]. It was powerful enough to destroy [[Sasori]]'s ultimate defence, [[Hiruko]].

== Trivia ==
* Although not named in the anime and manga, it is named in ''[[Naruto Shippūden: Ultimate Ninja Heroes 3]]''.

[[fr:Technique de Marionnettiste - Châtiment de l'Attaque Printanière]]
[[pt-br:Marionete: Ataque de Punição da Primavera]]
